message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Could you do it for $100?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
